cab.content: Printed for the Cabinet. January 1929.SECRET. Copy No. 28CP. 11 (29).CABINET.SPECIAL REPORT ON UNEMPLOYMENT.No. 167. December 1928.THIS Report gives a summary of the recently published returns of unemployment in the various industries. Latest Figures.The latest figure of unemployment available is that for the 14th January, 1929, giving a total number on the registers for Great Britain of 1,435,000. This is a decrease over the position on the 31st December, 1928, amounting to 85,749, but an increase over a year ago of 241,187.ARTHUR STEEL-MAITDAND.Ministry of Labour,January 26, 1929.
